name: Chilling Entombment
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You attempt to entomb a target creature within range in ice, bringing forth chilling cold. Make a magic attack roll. On a hit, the target takes 4d8 cold damage, plus your spellcasting stat, and loses 10 feet of movement speed for the duration, or until they take fire damage.

A creature reduced to 0 movement speed as a result of this spell is frozen solid for the duration as long as they have 0 movement speed. They are treated as if they were petrified. Taking fire damage ends the effect early.
empower: On a critical hit, the target's movement speed is decreased to 0. You can empower this spell after you score a critical hit.
